1.name: big toad
1.sight_near_hostile: You see <n>a big toad</n> in front of you. The toad appears unfriendly and stares at you with unnerving intensity.
1.sight_near_friendly: You see <n>a big toad</n> in front of you. The toad appears friendly and stares at you from time to time.
1.sight_far_hostile: You see <n>a big toad</n> at the <pos>.
1.sight_far_friendly: You see a something moving at the <pos>.
1.sound_near_hostile: You hear loud and frequent toad calls nearby.
1.sound_near_friendly: You occasionally hear loud toad calls nearby.
1.sound_far_always: You notice strange sounds coming from the <pos>.
attack_text: <name> opens it's mouth and whips you with it's poisonous tongue.
